tidbits.title: Amazon Rainforest
tidbits.description: Brazil hosts a significant portion of the Amazon Rainforest, the world's largest tropical rainforest, teeming with biodiversity and crucial for global ecological balance.

tidbits.title: Cultural Mosaic
tidbits.description: Brazil's diverse cultural heritage encompasses indigenous roots, Portuguese influence, and Afro-Brazilian traditions, showcased in its music, dance, and cuisine.

tidbits.title: Carnival Celebration
tidbits.description: The vibrant Carnival in Rio de Janeiro is one of the world's largest celebrations, featuring samba parades, elaborate costumes, and a festive atmosphere.
